name: Notion Goal Tracker
description: Keep track of your goals in NotionIf you're feeling trapped between "but" and "if" and struggling to achieve your goals, try using the Notion Template for Goal Tracking. This tool allows you to set your objectives, track your progress, and stay motivated throughout the process. With regular updates on your progress, you'll be able to achieve your goals faster and more effectively than ever before.FAQHow to download the template?Open the template link, then click the "Duplicate" button in the top
